nodes.text: A Warlord's Fury was a Star Wars Miniatures scenario that was written by Sterling Hershey and published on Wizards.com on May 25, 2006.

During the time of the New Republic, after the end of Operation Shadow Hand, the galaxy is still in chaos. An Imperial Warlord engages a crime syndicate which controlled an X-1 Viper war droid. His forces launch an assault against the syndicate's headquarters to eliminate the threat.
